NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​ISignatureVerifier
public interface
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​ISignatureVerifier
NetSparkleUpdater.​SignatureVerifiers.​DSAChecker
NetSparkleUpdater.​SignatureVerifiers.​Ed25519Checker

Interface for objects that can verify a signature for an app cast, a downloaded file, or some other item. This is used to verify that the correct data was downloaded from the internet and there wasn't any nefarious play or manipulation of items when something was delivered to the end user.

Properties
SecurityMode
SecurityMode SecurityMode { get; set }

The SecurityMode for the signature verifier. This determines the level of security for the application and the items that it downloads from the internet.

Functions
HasValidKeyInformation
bool HasValidKeyInformation()

Check to see if we have valid public (or other) key information so that we can verify signatures properly.

Returns

true if this object has valid public/other key information and can safely verify the signature of a given item; false otherwise

VerifySignature
ValidationResult VerifySignature(
string signature,
byte[] dataToVerify
)

Verify that the given data has the same signature as the passed-in signature

Parameters
signature
string

the base 64 signature to validate against dataToVerify's signature

dataToVerify
byte[]

the data that should be used to obtain a signature and checked against the passed-in signature

Returns

the ValidationResult result of the verification process

VerifySignatureOfFile
ValidationResult VerifySignatureOfFile(
string signature,
string binaryPath
)

Verify that the file at the given path has the same signature as the passed-in signature

Parameters
signature
string

the base 64 signature to validate against the signature of the file at binaryPath

binaryPath
string

the file path to the file whose signature you want to verify

Returns

the ValidationResult result of the verification process

VerifySignatureOfString
ValidationResult VerifySignatureOfString(
string signature,
string data
)

Verify that the file at the given path has the same signature as the passed-in string

Parameters
signature
string

the base 64 signature to validate against the signature of the passed-in string

data
string

the string whose signature you want to verify

Returns

the ValidationResult result of the verification process
